text: He granthaprapta lokera! Tomadera dharme barabari karo na, ara allah samparke satya chara an'ya katha balo na. Nihsandeha masih -- mariyamera putra isa hacchena allah‌ra ekajana rasula, ara tamra kalimah‌, ya tini mariyamera kache pathiyechilena, ara tamra kacha theke asa ruh‌, kaje'i imana ano allah‌ra prati o tamra rasulaganera prati, ara balo na -- ''tinajana’’, thamo -- tomadera jan'ya mangalamaya. Nihsandeha allah hacchena ekaka upasya, samasta mahima tamra'i, ye tamra kono putra thakabe! Ya-kichu ache mahakasamandale o ya-kichu ache prthibite se-saba tamra. Ara raksakarirupe allah‌i yathesta.
